name: server
description: Backend for the Real Estate Portfolio Management Suite.

scripts.db:init: sh -c 'psql -U $DB_USER -h $DB_HOST -p $DB_PORT -tc "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='$DB_DATABASE'" | grep -q 1 || psql -U $DB_USER -h $DB_HOST -p $DB_PORT -c "CREATE DATABASE $DB_DATABASE"' && psql -U $DB_USER -h $DB_HOST -p $DB_PORT -d $DB_DATABASE -f db/database.sql
